definition[0]: a small piece of thick rough material which covers part of a floor
example[0]: Wipe your feet on the mat.
definition[1]: a small flat piece of wood, cloth etc which protects a surface, especially on a table
example[1]: a beer mat  (=a mat for putting a glass of beer on)
example[2]: a mouse mat  (=for a computer mouse)
definition[2]: a piece of thick soft material used in some activities for people to sit on, fall onto etc
definition[3]: a thick mass of something such as hairs or leaves
